short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate percentages of your blockchain assets, which are deposited in BigONE

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a small helper for BigONE exchange. It helps you calculate the proportion of blockchain assets (deposited in BigONE exchange).
